title: sivir skin
body: Sooo guys lately i started playing sivir a lot and i saw the ''snowstorm sivir'' skin which im kinda in love...s do somebody knows if riot will put the skin available again and if no how can i get it ??{{champion:15}}

replies.body: It's legacy, which means it'll come back. :]
While we're on the subject: PAX skins; Is it correct that you're legally obligated to never re-release the skins, even if you wanted to?
I'm not sure about that - I just know that those skins aren't something we plan to re-release.
^ what he said.. And since its 975RP its close to $10 anyway :) I own it and love it, but I own all the Sivir skins , lol
It can be gotten in Mystery Gifting (which is all random! woo) and or during Christmas.
I would pay 10$ for this skin, I want it so bad xD
